title: Mathematics Workshop for Educators
description: Join us for a three-day workshop designed for educators seeking innovative teaching methods and strategies in mathematics. Explore new pedagogical approaches and network with fellow educators.

title: Annual Math Challenge Competition
description: Test your math skills and compete with students from across the region in our annual math challenge competition. Cash prizes and certificates will be awarded to the top performers.

title: Math in the Real World Symposium
description: Dive into the practical applications of mathematics in various industries. Renowned mathematicians and industry experts will share insights on how math is shaping the real world.
